details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.10 Optional content - Name key unique
details.description: Each optional content configuration dictionary shall contain the Name key, whose value shall be unique amongst all optional content configuration dictionaries within the PDF/A-4 file.

rule.description: Each optional content configuration dictionary shall contain the Name key, whose value shall be unique amongst all optional content configuration dictionaries within the PDF/A-4 file.

error.message: Optional content configuration dictionary has duplicated name %1
